CA.name: Paper Mario™
CA.description: After Bowser™ steals the Star Rod and kidnaps Princess Peach™, Mario™ plots to rescue the seven Star Spirits and free the Mushroom Kingdom from the Koopa's rule. As Mario travels from the tropical jungles of Lavalava Island to the frosty heights of Shiver Mountain, he'll need all the help he can get. Master the abilities of the seven Star Spirits and the other allies joining the adventure to aid our hero on the battlefield. There are over 50 Badges to locate that, when equipped, will grant special abilities and powerful attacks. The turn-based battle system will make fighting Bowser's baddies equal parts strategy and timing. Discover over 100 items, mix them together, and cook up fantastic creations that will send your enemies' spinning and fleeing. Close the book on Bowser's story before his evil deeds turn the world upside down and only his wishes come true!

MX.name: Paper Mario™
MX.description: Después de que Bowser robara la varita estelar y secuestrara a la princesa Peach, Mario planea rescatar a los siete espíritus estelares y liberar al reino Champiñón del dominio de Koopa. Mario necesitará toda la ayuda posible en su recorrido desde las junglas tropicales de Isla Lavalava hasta los altos glaciares de Montaña Escalofrío. Domina las habilidades de los siete espíritus estelares y otros aliados que se unen a la aventura para ayudar a nuestro héroe en este campo de batalla. Hay más de 50 insignias por encontrar que otorgan habilidades especiales y potentes ataques al ser equipadas. Con un sistema de combate basado en turnos, combatir a los secuaces de Bowser necesitará tanto de estrategia como de sincronización Descubre más de 100 objetos, combínalos y obtén creaciones fantásticas que harán que tus enemigos den vueltas y salgan huyendo. Cierra el libro en la historia de Bowser antes de que sus malvadas obras lleven al mundo al caos y solamente sus deseos se hagan realidad.

US.name: Paper Mario™
US.description: After Bowser™ steals the Star Rod and kidnaps Princess Peach™, Mario™ plots to rescue the seven Star Spirits and free the Mushroom Kingdom from the Koopa's rule. As Mario travels from the tropical jungles of Lavalava Island to the frosty heights of Shiver Mountain, he'll need all the help he can get. Master the abilities of the seven Star Spirits and the other allies joining the adventure to aid our hero on the battlefield. There are over 50 Badges to locate that, when equipped, will grant special abilities and powerful attacks. The turn-based battle system will make fighting Bowser's baddies equal parts strategy and timing. Discover over 100 items, mix them together, and cook up fantastic creations that will send your enemies' spinning and fleeing. Close the book on Bowser's story before his evil deeds turn the world upside down and only his wishes come true!
